short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens Menus, Reports and tables with a click, simplifying navigation for developers in Dynamics 365.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension streamlines by generating direct links to menus, classes, and reports in the table browser within Microsoft Dynamics 365 F&O. No more manual menu item creation or typing in address barâ€“ simply click and explore!

This can be very handy during an implementation when you are working on multiple projects. 

You can set up your browser to automatically launch the extension when you press a keyboard shortcut. 

Save time by eliminating the need to add menu items.

Keep checking back for additional improvements!
